channel.title: Website help
channel.description: I making a webpage...but i also want to add SMF on the same host... how would i do this... i know how to set up SMF but not with a second webpage on the same file maneger and shit....lol BTW i am using x10hosting.... if i cant use this site tell me.!

item.title: Website help
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:7, topic:270800”][quote author=Creme de la Creme link=topic=357351.msg2747416#msg2747416 date=1239713969]
Install SMF in its own directory, ie /smf/

How can there even be a question about it? It’s like asking how to save your pictures in another folder than My Pictures.
[/quote]
How DO you save pictures into another folder?[/quote]

Call tech support.

Read full topic
